member.name: M:VSEIoTCoreServer.WebApp.Services.IDeviceConfigurationService.GetAll
member.summary: Get a List of configured devices from the SQLite DataBase.

member.name: M:VSEIoTCoreServer.WebApp.Services.IDeviceConfigurationService.GetById(System.Int32)
member.summary: Get the device configuration for a specific device with the given deviceId from the SQLite DataBase.
member.returns: The device configuration for the device specified by deviceId.

member.name: M:VSEIoTCoreServer.WebApp.Services.IDeviceConfigurationService.AddDevice(VSEIoTCoreServer.WebApp.ViewModels.AddDeviceViewModel)
member.summary: Add a device configuration to the database.
member.param: The device configuration that shall be added.
member.returns: The view model of the device configuration that has been added to the database.

member.name: M:VSEIoTCoreServer.WebApp.Services.IDeviceConfigurationService.UpdateDevice(VSEIoTCoreServer.WebApp.ViewModels.DeviceConfigurationViewModel)
member.summary: Update an existing device configuration in the database.
member.param: The model containing the device configuration.

member.name: M:VSEIoTCoreServer.WebApp.Services.IGlobalIoTCoreService.Start
member.summary: Starts a global IoTCore instance and all configured VSEIoTCore instances and mirrors them into the global IoTCore.

member.name: M:VSEIoTCoreServer.WebApp.Services.IGlobalIoTCoreService.Stop
member.summary: Stops the global IoTCore instance and all started VSEIoTCore instances.

member.name: M:VSEIoTCoreServer.WebApp.Services.IGlobalIoTCoreService.AddMirror(VSEIoTCoreServer.WebApp.ViewModels.DeviceConfigurationViewModel)
member.summary: Add the VSEIoTCore instance of the device specified by deviceId to the global IoTCore.
member.param: The configuration of the device that shall be added to the global IoTCore.

member.name: M:VSEIoTCoreServer.WebApp.Services.IGlobalIoTCoreService.GetStatus
member.summary: Get the status of the global IoTCore instance.
member.returns: The status of the global IoTCore instance.

member.name: M:VSEIoTCoreServer.WebApp.Services.IIoTCoreService.Start(System.Int32)
member.summary: Starts a VSEIoTCore process for the device with the given deviceId.

member.name: M:VSEIoTCoreServer.WebApp.Services.IIoTCoreService.Stop(System.Int32)
member.summary: Stops a VSEIoTCore process for the device with the given deviceId.

member.name: M:VSEIoTCoreServer.WebApp.Services.IIoTCoreService.Status(System.Int32)
member.summary: Get the current status of the device with the given deviceId.
member.returns: The StatusViewModel containing the IoTStatus and DeviceStatus of the device.

member.name: M:VSEIoTCoreServer.WebApp.Services.IIoTCoreService.GetDeviceStatus(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Get the status of the device with the given url and port.

member.name: M:VSEIoTCoreServer.WebApp.Services.IIoTCoreService.GetIoTStatus(System.Int32)
member.summary: Get the status of the IoTCore process for the device with the given deviceId.
